organelles.name: BezierCurve
organelles.description: Helps visualize or simulate a structure path in the cell.
organelles.function: Placeholder visual component, not a real organelle.

organelles.name: BezierCurve 2
organelles.description: Another Bezier curve for visual representation.
organelles.function: Placeholder visual component, not a real organelle.

organelles.name: Nucleus
organelles.description: Control center of the cell containing genetic material (DNA).
organelles.function: Regulates cell activities and stores genetic information.

organelles.name: Mitochondrion
organelles.function: Generates energy in the form of ATP.

organelles.name: Cell Membrane
organelles.function: Controls the movement of substances in and out of the cell.

organelles.name: Golgi Apparatus
organelles.description: Modifies, sorts, and packages proteins and lipids.
organelles.function: Prepares molecules for use inside or outside the cell.

organelles.name: Endoplasmic Reticulum 1
organelles.description: Network of membranes within the cell.

organelles.name: Endoplasmic Reticulum 2
organelles.description: Another ER section for modeling clarity.

organelles.name: Lysosomes 1
organelles.function: Break down waste materials and cellular debris.

organelles.name: Lysosomes 2
organelles.function: Part of the digestive system of the cell.
